The videos show pieces of Ferrero Rocher: 2. Insect infestation is not a common manufacturing problem with Ferrero Chocolates, but can result from improper storage procedures.
The claim that a Ferrero Rocher: customer care representative" said that insect infestation was a "common problem" with the chocolates is not believable, as the company disputed this claim on Facebook.
